org.springframework.data.keyvalue.repository.query

类 SpelQueryCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.repository.query.parser.AbstractQueryCreator<KeyValueQuery<org.springframework.expression.spel.standard.SpelExpression>,String>
      • org.springframework.data.keyvalue.repository.query.SpelQueryCreator

  • public class SpelQueryCreator
extends org.springframework.data.repository.query.parser.AbstractQueryCreator<KeyValueQuery<org.springframework.expression.spel.standard.SpelExpression>,String>
    AbstractQueryCreator to create SpelExpression based KeyValueQuerys.

    • 构造器概要

      Creates a new SpelQueryCreator for the given PartTree and ParameterAccessor.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected String and(org.springframework.data.repository.query.parser.Part part, String base, Iterator<Object> iterator)
      Creates a new criteria object from the given part and and-concatenates it to the given base criteria.
      protected KeyValueQuery<org.springframework.expression.spel.standard.SpelExpression> complete(String criteria, Sort sort)
      Actually creates the query object applying the given criteria object and Sort definition.
      protected String create(org.springframework.data.repository.query.parser.Part part, Iterator<Object> iterator)
      Creates a new atomic instance of the criteria object.
      protected String or(String base, String criteria)
      Or-concatenates the given base criteria to the given new criteria.
